reviews.customers_say: Customers like the cardigan's appearance, with one noting its tailored collar, and appreciate its great quality and perfect weight. The color receives mixed feedback, with several customers describing it as beautiful, though one mentions it turned their white shirt underneath pink. The fit, length, thickness, and layout also receive mixed reviews.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality!
items.body: This is a beautiful jacket and I get complements every time I wear it. It does fit bigger than I expected, but I am okay with that. It has great quality material and a nice stretch. Large pockets and beautiful color for a little extra warmth with some all-day wear style! Read more
items.author: Shannon Krone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really quite stunning
items.body: I bought this sweater for the holidays. I wanted something that would add a festive feel. This sweater does not disappoint. It’s a beautiful rich color and has a very luxurious look. I am delighted Read more
items.author: RF

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Turned my clothes red!!!
items.body: Please be sure to wash this by itself before wearing it. I wore it with jeans and a white top like in the picture and it turned my top and jeans pink where it touched the inside of the velvet, ruining them. It does look nice but I can’t believe it would do this to my other clothes. I have worn stuff off Amazon without washing them hundreds of times and never has this happened. Read more
items.author: Kim Boehm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Buy!
items.body: Great quality! Heavy weight! Great fit! Read more
items.author: Danette Rainbird

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheap looking
items.body: The color of this is very dark, and it’s not lined, so it doesn’t have a crisp look. Very floppy. The image on the ad isn’t a good representation. Read more
items.author: Gina adams

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's OK
items.body: When I see a velvet or velveteen item, I think warmth and softness. The negative about this fabric is that the under side is slick and it is cold to the touch until body heat warms it up. I don't like cold feeling things.. one of my oddities...and it bothers me. It wasn't bad and as long as you could keep the under side hidden so that only the pretty soft side showed, you'd have a very nice jacket. I couldn't do that so I returned it. Read more
items.author: LadyC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Velvet Duster
items.body: This duster is just as gorgeous in person as it is in the photos. My only complaint is I will the arms were a little longer. I am 6 ft. And the arms hit just below mid forearm instead of wrist. No issue though, I just pushed up the sleeves to make it looked styled that way. Would def. Buy again. Read more
items.author: Jodi Huebner-Marquez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great cardigan coat
items.author: Samantha Downing

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Gold, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
